Reviews.Title: Long camera range solution
Reviews.Author: H. C. McIntyre
Reviews.Content: I needed to have a long camera run so I could watch the animals pass day and night down at the lake. Worked great, Bears, deer, raccoons, foxes, even alligators swimming around and an occasional otter makes for enjoyable watching from the comfort of my easy chair. Excellent cable.

Reviews.Author: val allain
Reviews.Content: just right.just what i was looking for.to many word that i have to do for this review . just wath i was looking for

Reviews.Title: Just what I needed
Reviews.Author: Nova
Reviews.Content: Worked greatThese are the cable I neededThey give good camera imageI could not find them any cheaper

Reviews.Author: lmassman
Reviews.Content: Could use as the ends didn't match the camera or defenderMight include adapter to standard RCA adapter or BNC

Reviews.Title: Great Purchase
Reviews.Author: Linduh
Reviews.Content: this camera system i swear it is very clear with a little light  only thing is little fuzzy when you zoomk in but for a distance of 30 fett can pick out face pretty good...
